name: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora - Storm Chaser Starter Pack
description: The Storm Chaser Starter Pack includes a cosmetic bioluminescent banshee paint override, character set, weapon set and 4,600 tokens to unlock new gear, weapons, banshee gear, and more!

name: Planet Coaster 2: Thrill-Seekers Ride Pack
description: Prepare to spin, whirl and wow your guests with the Thrill-Seekers Ride Pack. Create and customise a swirling sensation with five high-adrenaline new attractions that are sure to provide your guests with the ride of a lifetime - if they're brave enough!

name: Killing Floors 2: Plague Doctor Outfit Bundle
description: Comes with the Plague Doctor Outfit and Hood (includes 6 of skin styles). Compatible with most characters.

name: Paint Ball
description: Tight platformer with a lot of traps, skill tests and a funny soundtrack

name: Train Sim World 4: Cathcart Circle Line - Glasgow - Newton & Neilston
description: Experience the hustle and bustle of a modern suburban network using classic electric traction, link Glasgow's suburbs along the Cathcart Circle Line. Now fully remastered as part of a free update, take in the all-new detail in Train Sim World 4!

name: Train Sim World 4: Clinchfield Railroad - Elkhorn - Dante
description: Experience classic railroading moving heavy coal and manifest freight through the heart of Virginia's coalfields with Train Sim World 2: Clinchfield Railroad. It's your job to take charge of freight services through the rugged Appalachians, utilising the EMD F7 and SD40 diesel locomotives.

name: Train Sim World 4: Peninsula Corridor - San Francisco - San Jose
description: California Dreamin' with the Peninsula Corridor. In serving San Francisco and California's 'Silicon Valley', commuter railroad Caltrain calls at 26 stations and, equipped with Caltrain's F40PH-2CAT diesels and Gallery equipment, it will be your job to keep thousands of daily commuters on time!

name: Train Sim World 4: Spirit of Steam - Liverpool Lime Street - Crewe
description: Step back in time and discover the soot and sounds of the romantic steam era; climb aboard iconic living locomotives hungry for coal and water, and work hard on busy passenger and freight services through historic Merseyside and Cheshire with Train Sim World 3: Spirit of Steam: Liverpool - Crewe!

name: MechWarrior 5: Clans - Digital Collectors Content
description: MECHWARRIOR 5: CLANS Digital Collectors Content Includes a Digital Art Book, the full Soundtrack, an Omnimech Technical Readout. Plus exclusive in-game content Platinum Mech Patterns and Timber Wolf WAR Omnimech with unique weapon loadout and skin.

name: MechWarrior 5: Clans - Invasion Mech Patterns
description: MECHWARRIOR 5: CLANS Invasion Mech patterns. Unlock the Invasion Mech Patterns for 16 Clan Omnimechs. Customize your mechs with these unique designs and stand out on the battlefield.

name: MasterChef: Learn to Cook! - Christmas Special
description: Christmas is here! Roll up your sleeves and cook up a holiday feast worthy of a number one chef!

name: Path of Exile: Lord of Ogham Supporter Pack
description: The Lord of Ogham Supporter Pack contains Early Access to Path of Exile 2, an Armour Set, a Back Attachment, a Portal Effect, a Weapon Skin, two Pets, a Hideout Decoration, a Portrait Frame, a Forum Title, a Badge, and 600 points.

name: Path of Exile: Liberator of Wraeclast Supporter Pack
description: The Liberator of Wraeclast Supporter Pack contains Early Access to Path of Exile 2, five Armour Sets, five Back Attachments, two Hideouts, two Portal Effects, seven Hideout Decorations, twelve Weapon Skins, six Pets, a Finisher Effect, a Weapon Effect, a Level-up Effect, five Portrait Frames, five Forum Titles, five Badges, and 3700 Points.

name: One Girl's Trash
description: Maggie is a simple girl. She doesn't want any trouble, nor does she start any trouble. But sometimes trouble finds you despite your best attempts to avoid it. When Maggie's trash goes missing, she does whatever she can to ensure she gets it back.

name: Star Breaker
description: Star Breaker is a fairly traditional Japanese RPG, with top-down view, world map navigation, random turn-based battles, and all the other usual ingredients. Battles can be set on Auto for quicker pacing. Since the setting of the game is a mixture of sci-fi and medieval fantasy, character use a variety of weapons from swords to guns, as well as special psychic attacks. There are also some space ship combat in the game, and it is possible to upgrade the player's ship later on.

name: The Willowmist Emporium of Antiques & Curiosities
description: A cozy narrative shop sim where you move to the sleepy town of Willowmist to run your aunt’s antique store. Meet 5 charming love interests and quirky locals—each with secrets to uncover—in a town where nothing is quite as it seems. Buy, sell, and haggle to keep the store afloat!

name: Sixtar Gate: Stargazer
description: Sixtar Gate: STARGAZER is the exciting spinoff to the beloved rhythm game Sixtar Gate: Startrail. Play reimagined band-style versions of original tracks, explore a new story in Adventure Mode, and enjoy intuitive 4-lane rhythm gameplay perfect for beginners and veterans alike.

name: Deus Ex: Lay D Denton project
Defense of Fort Burton
description:
This is game made by Ledx. A small indie game developer.
This is a single player game where player can defend the Fort Burton againsts evil forces. This is side scrolling point of view and similar to the genre of tower defense where enemies come in series and player need to strategically defend the fort.

name: Indie Heroes Collection 4
description: The Indie Heroes return to Evercade with another lineup of new games made for (and in the style of) vintage gaming hardware. Includes the dig-and-bomb ’em up action of Murtop, the inimitable bouncy platforming of Flea!2, Batty Zabella’s saucy adventures and many more!

name: Broken Sword Collection
description: Paris in the fall holds many memories for George Stobbart: of cafés, of music, of love, and of death. Now on Evercade, you can explore the first two adventures in this legendary series, presented in their original 32-bit console form.

name: ZigZag Ball
description: ZigZag Ball is an endless casual game, switch sides to move forward in the world and do your best to stay on the right track and not fall, and collect diamonds.

description: Into Death and Beyond is a gripping first-person survival horror game set on the hostile planet XB32-ENT. As bounty hunter Mark Helkins, scavenge for resources, solve puzzles, and confront terrifying mutants. Unravel dark secrets and capture a rogue alien before it hunts you down. Will you survive?

Piece together well-drawn images of your accidental dates to unlock seductive conversations and deepen your connections. Every choice you make in dialogues shapes your relationships, leading to a tempting ending. With gorgeous artwork and steamy, suggestive content, Dating Stories gives an experience for those seeking both charm and challenge.

The objective of this jam was to re:imagine multiplayer maps from different games as single player experiences, all while making use of the three Re:Mobilize mechanics (trampolines, wiremeshes, and lighthooks/lightpanels).

name: ReSpaced
description: A fast-paced first-person shooter where you master gun recoil to leap across platforms, battle various enemies, and upgrade your weapon to escape an overrun space station.

name: Sacrilege
description: Sacrilege evokes the feels of Quake: Mission Packs 1 and 2 and is a new fork of the Re:Mobilize and Progs Dump 3 mods. It comes with additional monsters, weapons and powerups. This is a set of 3 episodes of 5 maps each - plus one secret map per episode - as well as a start map and an end map. This makes use of Re:Mobilize mechanics such as wiremeshes and lighthooks/lightpanels.

name: Hillbilly Hellfire
description: Defend a holy relic in this third-person tower defense repelling waves of hellspawn using divine intervention and a bit of hillbilly ingenuity. Charge headfirst into fierce battles, outsmarting twisted foes with quick decisions, explosive turrets, and precision gunplay as you claim victory!

name: Tower Deckfense
description: Tower Deckfense is an exciting blend of tower defense and deck building. Build your deck strategically, upgrade your towers, and equip them with powerful modifiers to discover the best combinations and devastate your enemies.

name: Spring Tales
description: Spring Tales is a cozy 2D puzzle adventure game. Help the charming residents of Blossomdale prepare for their spring festival by solving puzzles, overcoming challenges, and rebuilding after a storm. Experience a heartwarming story filled with friendship, hope, and community spirit.

name: Nightborn
description:
Nightborn is an Action RPG with narrative-focused gameplay set in a dark gothic version of our own world.
Players assume the role of the Bloodhound, a Vampire detective trained in tracking supernatural threats to the Nightborn, using arcane rituals forbidden to others of your kind.
Investigate a series of disappearances of your fellow Vampires, including your Maker, a politically influential member of the Nightborn, the Vampire elite of New Orleans.

Create your own Bloodhound character, choosing from 10 iconic Vampire lineages with a set of signature lineage power skill trees.

Lineage powers include physical prowess enhancements, shapeshifting, controlling the minds of mortals, and acts of eldritch sorcery.

Fuel Vampire powers by preying upon mortals via stealth, seduction, or brute force.

Elude Mortal Law Enforcement and Monster Hunters, masking your dark nature.

Solve the mysteries of gothic New Orleans by taking quests, discovering clues, and exploring the supernatural underworld.

Battle, evade, or outwit, natural and supernatural foes, using your powers, weapons, and tactics.

Side with a Nightborn faction, the ruling Establishment, the reckless Libertines, or the fanatical Orthodoxy; or eschew them all to forge your own path.

name: Fortnite: Chapter 6 - Season 2: Lawless
description: Ransack Fletcher Kane’s banks, pull off a train heist and make an explosive getaway in Battle Royale Chapter 6 Season 2: LAWLESS.

name: The Fairly OddParents: Breakin' da Rules
description:
PC Version of "The Fairly OddParents: Breakin' da Rules"

The PC version features a different plot. In this version, Juandissimo Magnifico tricks Timmy into wishing the book destroyed so that Cosmo and Wanda will get in trouble for it. It also notably features an appearance by Vicky and Tootie's mother (at Timmy's age, as the level featuring her is set in the past), named Nicky. She is shown behaving a lot like Tootie, and Timmy initially mistakes her for Tootie when he first sees her, although the in-game graphics depict her as resembling a young Vicky.

name: Dying Sun
description: Dying Sun is a cozy surfing game in which you play as Hurabi, a young nomad on a solar-powered sailboard, searching for the mysterious causes of the extinction of an ancient, highly advanced civilization. On her journey, she travels through grandiose landscapes where nature and technology meet.

name: Poltergeist Prodigy
description:
Poltergeist Prodigy is a single-player, story-focused, puzzle action-adventure game, a first person haunter where you delight in being a mischievous ghost.

You are a new ghost, and to continue existing and uncover how you died you must haunt the living. With guidance from a comedic, more experienced ghost, you will learn to haunt people and animals with a variety of techniques in a range of places. By throwing objects around, conjuring scary aspects, possessing people, and ultilising many more haunting abilities, you will scare your way to becoming a more powerful spirit and trigger memories of how you died and the mysterious circumstances behind it.

name: Night Drive
description: My version of the Atari's arcade game Night Driver and Dr. Reiner Foerst's Nürburgring 1.

name: Project Float
description: Join Buddy on his adventure to take down BluCo Science and save his town from the robot attack. Project Float is a puzzle based platformer with several RPG elements. You play as the child hero who stumbles upon an abandoned sphere who encourages him to help him defeat the robot overlord secretly in charge of this island. On your adventure you find several other robotic spheres who each give you, the player, a unique ability that will help you pass through obstacles.

description: Donald Trump signs the executive order to change the Gulf of Mexico to Gulf of America. Boyfriend is not happy about this, so he breaks into the oval office and demands that Trump change back the name. However, to change the name back, Boyfriend has to beat Trump in a rap battle.

name: Immortum
description: This psychological horror unravels your mind aboard the Immortum, a decaying spaceship carrying an impossible truth. Every wrong step risks a game over, and every right one twists your truth. Survive as Romi, a mother desperate to find her dying child in a foreign reality.

name: Castillon
description:
Defend your Kingdom

As a renoun wizard you lay claim to a new land and build your castle! But beware, for demon invaders roam the wilds. Grow your kingdom during the day then fight off waves of enemies at night!

Castillon is a bite sized strategy game about building and defending your growing castle realm.

name: Detective Frizbee
description: Welcome to "Detective Frizbee". It’s an open-world RPG with a detective twist. In this game, you play as Frizbee, a cuddly, silly yet clever puppy. You’ll follow the storyline and help Frizbee solve puzzles to deduce who the culprit could be.

name: Breeze of Ashes
description: Command airships in a tactical RTS where choices shape your story. Manage resources, upgrade your fleet, and battle rival factions in a non-linear campaign. With rogue-lite replayability, multiplayer co-op, and skirmish modes, your journey evolves with every playthrough.

name: DeadWire
description: Hack, link, and shoot in a fast-paced top-down cyberpunk shooter. Create devastating chain reactions to outwit enemies, break records and save your childhood mentor from a ruthless syndicate

description:
Counter-Strike T:Z is primarily a mod/game using some original content from games such as "Counter-Strike", "Counter-Strike: Nexon",
"Counter-Strike 2"

The purpose of the development: In the future, use Ray Tracing and PhysX technologies to make the game more realistic.

The game includes such game modes as: PVP/PVE, DeathMatch, GunDeathMatch, Classic, Zombie Mode

name: Vespera Bononia
description: Vespera Bononia is a fast-paced action-roguelite set in an ever-changing city. Fight as nightmares come to life and switch classes as a shifting soul. Master a mix of third-person shooter, magic and bullet hell to survive.

name: Machick 2
description: The anti-magic toads are back, stronger than ever, and the magical chickens are unleashing ancient powers to fight them! With even more wands and powers to master, vanquish enemies, collect XP, and upgrade like never before in Machick 2! Get ready to out-magic the menace!

name: Broventure: The Wild Co-op
description: Broventure = Vampire Survival + Base building + Co-op. Band together with friends and obliterate hordes of grueling enemies, gather crucial resources, and transform your camp into a sanctuary of liberation.

name: Cruzcredo: Become a Legend!
description: Rise from the grave and stumble though the streets of Casca Dura, a city buzzing with mysteries, wacky gossip and some good ol' chaos thanks to the "Cruzcredo Curse". Flying rats, a vengeful ghost bride and, oh boy, the skinwalkers... Save Casca Dura from it's doom and become a legend!

name: Monster Train 2
description: It's time to raise Hell in Heaven! Monster Train returns with all new clans, new enemy factions, new challenges, new modes and more! Defend your Pyre in the classic three-tiered, vertical gameplay that made the original roguelike deckbuilder a hit.

name: Bobo and the Chest of Nightmares
description: Jump, glide, and outsmart traps in this whimsical 3D platformer! Smash, fend off mischievous spirits, grind rails, and solve puzzles as you uncover the secrets of the Nightmare Chest. Collect hidden treasures and restore joy to a world shrouded in darkness!

name: Dashing Dasher
description: Dash through the city in your Dashing outfit, get to your goal. Become the ultimate Dasher

name: Green Bakery
description:
You play as the main character, who, going to work, goes to the bakery on the way. There fate confronts you with a baker who loves melodramas and Frank Sinatra. And you, of course.
There are five endings in the game.

name: The Stepfather Remake
description:
Welcome to the 1920s, an era of jazz, speakeasies, and gangsters with more ambition than brains. In this classic point-and-click adventure, you’ll step into the shoes of Aurelliot, a down-on-his-luck private detective who, drowning in debt and short on clients, takes on a case that seems simple… until it isn’t.

What starts with a mysterious woman and a suspicious job spirals into a tangled web of blackmail, secrets, and absurd situations, where every conversation could hold the key and every object might (or might not) be useful. Inept gangsters, nosy bartenders, and a slew of puzzles await you in this remastered version of the 2003 classic—now with enhanced graphics, a remastered soundtrack, and brand-new voice acting for an even more immersive experience.

name: Cats 'n Blocks
description: Cats 'n Blocks is a chaotic action game where you control a cat that attacks enemies by picking up pieces of the ground. Raise your paws and prepare yourself to fight, mess around, explore and unlock hidden items in this fast-paced adventure.

name: Dice People
description: Dice People is an incremental game about rolling dice, creating a mass of units, smashing enemies, and gathering resources to get upgrades in a big skilltree.

name: Hack & Climb
description:
Hack&Climb isA physics-based 2D rage game where every swing matters!
Master your axe to climb, swing, and conquer brutal challenges.
Hard, fair, and addictively fun!

name: Pagliaccionautas
description: This mechanism now in your hands is not exactly a game. I'm not going to say it isn't a game; who am I to deny you the right to play? What I call a "cursed tool" is a synthetic studio. You take on the role of The Clown, an inquisitive and scathing fellow, determined to fulfill his mission: to form the perfect team of Paglaccionautas.

Stunt Flyer is an open-world flying adventure,

Sophie.

name: Cashier Simulator
description: Grocery Store Manager

name: Deep, In the Forest
description: Strategic card-based RPG, where you are tasked with liberating the forest kingdom from the tyranny of the Mad King.

name: Baptiste
description:
Submerge yourself in a first-hand experience that will make you feel each chill as if it were real. The line between the game and reality blurs further with each step you take.

Explore a mansion where horror awaits in every shadow. The masterful dubbing and sound track will drag you to the depths of a nightmare. Darkness will become your most feared enemy, putting your bravery to the test in each corner.

Play as Tom, a young man still suffering from the tragedy. After the loss of his father, he accompanies his mother Sara on what ought to be a new beginning. However, the ghosts of the past threaten to consume him. Can you keep control against the siege of his inner demons?

Disentangle the gruesome secrets that impregnate each floorboard and each crack on the walls. Each discovery will reveal a story of pain and horror that beggars belief.

Submerge yourself into a world where beauty and terror coexist in a macabre dance. The visual design will transport you to a kingdom where the grotesque is fascinating.

Each objective, each note and each whisper contribute towards weaving the plot. Your perseverance in the face of fear will be rewarded with chilling revelations that will keep you on edge until the very end.

name: Greenhouse
description: Explore the eerie galleries and botanical spaces of the Greenhouse. Piece together the mystery ahead of the big reveal. Interact with optical art, illusions and weather effects. Turn on entities if you dare.

name: The Fat Cat Fest
description: Fat Cat Fest is a party game full of minigames and challenges, where funny cats will compete to see who is the fastest and most skillful eater.

name: Piece by Piece
description: Piece by Piece is a LITERAL puzzle platformer where each level is fragmented into puzzle piece-shaped fragments. Assemble and unassemble the pieces to guide your character to the doorway and reach the next level!

name: Lumi Trek
description: Lumi Trek is a unique rhythm platformer where you have to combine the three primary colors of light to overcome obstacles. Change the color of the moving star at the right time, and stay calm when deadly traps appear. It may sound simple, but this challenge will make your hands sweat!

name: Slice & Dice: Pizza Shop Simulator
description: Manage the shop by day, serving customers and keeping everything afloat, by night fend off hordes of crazed lunatics and handle unexpected challenges that come with being a small business owner. Enjoy a mix of cooking simulations, tower defense, and multiplayer co-op in this unique pizza adventure.

name: The Curse of the Howling Woods
description:
You signed up for a simple job - pull some weeds, make a little cash. Instead, you got bitten by a werewolf, tricked by an old woman, and thrown into a maze of crypts, curses, and questionable life choices.

Now you have two hours to undo your fate before you sprout fur and start howling at the moon.

The Curse of the Howling Woods is a 2D adventure game that blends classic horror tropes, witty dialogue, and cozy but chaotic gameplay. Navigate haunted woods, solve puzzles, dodge traps, and try not to get mugged by a pumpkin.

Features

Cozy Combat – Enemies? One hit and they’re gone. You? Well… hopefully, you’re lucky.

A Maze of Mayhem – Crypts, quicksand, rolling boulders—this forest wants you to fail.

A Cast of Oddballs – Befriend (or avoid) scam-artist Eudora, overly dramatic ghosts, and Tim the werewolf, who insists it was just business.

Survive the night, break the curse, and maybe - just maybe - get paid for your trouble.

name: Anime Dance-Off: Space Party
description: Step into a universe where music and movement collide in a spectacular party experience for seasoned rhythm gamers and newcomers.

name: Anime Girls: Awesome Adventurer
description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

description: An unforgettable vacation in Canada.

name: Art of Glide 3
description: Spread your wings and discover the beauty of a boundless world, one landmark at a time.

name: Battlefront Trench Warriors: Ops of Warfare & Trench Shooter: Warfare Tactics Bundle Collection
description: From Trenches to Triumph—Your Battle, Your Legacy!

name: Bing in Wonderland: Power Up Edition
description: Fight, loot and upgrade your adventurer Bing!

name: Blackbeard's Treasure
description:
Toss coins and rule the high seas!
Golden riches slumber on the treasure islands that await you!

name: Crosswords: World Tour
description: Are you a fan of crosswords? Do you like travelling? Heck! Who doesn't?! Crosswords: World Tour is the game for you!

name: Like a Dragon: Pirate Yakuza in Hawaii - Deluxe Edition
description:
■PIRATE YAKUZA ADVENTURE AHOY!
Goro Majima, a notorious ex-yakuza suddenly finds himself shipwrecked on a remote island in the Pacific. Unable to remember even his own name, he sets sail in search of clues to his lost memories, accompanied by a boy named Noah who saved his life. Before long, they’re caught up in a conflict between cutthroat criminals, modern-day pirates, and other scoundrels over a legendary treasure.

■GET YOUR SHIP TOGETHER
Assemble a one-of-a-kind crew while upgrading your ship as you explore the open sea and forge your legend in the cannon fire of foes, unexpected friendships, and immense riches made along the way.

When an enemy pirate ship catches you in their sights, an exhilarating real-time cannon battle breaks out. Quickly maneuver into position while avoiding fire, then deliver devastating damage to board the enemy ship and take down the captain in all-out crew vs. crew brawls. Conquer the seas, discover hidden islands and acquire loads of loot like a true yakuza pirate!

■KICK ARRRSS WITH CREATIVE COMBAT
Dynamically switch between the “Mad Dog” and “Pirate” fighting styles to mix-up attacks and deliver explosive combos, juggles, and aerial takedowns that reward your creativity with over-the-top action.

With “Mad Dog” style, utilize speed, agility, and flair to deliver precise yet powerful blows that stun your enemies into submission.

Or make enemies walk the plank with the “Pirate” style that has you dual-wielding short swords and deploying tricky pirate tools to kick some serious booty.

*This product contains the base game and add-on content. Please be aware that the additional content is also sold separately.
*The “Legendary Pirate Crew Pack” will be available after the main character's pirate ship upgrade event in Chapter 2 of the main game.
*The “Legendary Outfit Pack” will be available after the ability to change outfits is unlocked in Chapter 2 of the main game.
*The “Ship Customization Pack” will be available after the main character's pirate ship upgrade event in Chapter 2 of the main game.
*The “Extra Karaoke & CD Pack” will be available after gaining access to a smartphone in Chapter 1 of the main game.
*The contents of the "Legendary Pirate Crew Pack", "Legendary Outfit Pack", "Ship Special Customization Pack" & "Additional Karaoke & BGM Pack" will not be counted toward in-game achievements.

name: Samurai Pizza Cats: Blast from the Past!
description:
That’s right folks! After more then 30 years the Samurai Pizza Cats finally return! The Big Cheese has an evil Scheme up his sleeve and it’s up to you, the player to stop him from taking over Little Tokyo!

The show first aired in Japan on February 1, 1990. Kyatto Ninden Teyandee is a science-fiction, action-comedy animated show set in Edoropolis, a city inhabited by anthropomorphic robotic animals. The series gained international recognition in the early 1990s when it was localized as Samurai Pizza Cats and broadcast worldwide and has maintained a dedicated fanbase to this day.

The new game, Samurai Pizza Cats: Blast from the Past!, is being developed by Dutch studio BLAST ZERO (creative team behind Jitsu Squad) and will be globally distributed by Red Dunes Games from the United Arab Emirates. Designed as a 2D action RPG, the game allows players to seamlessly switch between members of the Pizza Cats, utilizing their unique abilities to solve puzzles and engage in thrilling battles within the world of Little Tokyo.

description: Colonial Combat is the new, exciting, retro-styled, 1–vs–1, 2D, indie Unity3D fighting game for Windows 7 (and newer) PCs! The game is a fictional, comedic, non-violent fighting game with tongue-in-cheek satire and in-jokes about college life and surviving at a certain university, and based (loosely) on real campus settings as levels, and archetypal student types and figureheads as characters. description:
Miraland is under the spell of strange happenings—full moons lingering for days, Queen Philomi's Palace Ruins blooming with eerie purple flowers, and the once-mighty Bullquet now sluggish... Something dark lurks in the night. While most would steer clear of these eerie events near Queen Philomi's Palace Ruins, for brave adventurers, this is the perfect chance to seek thrills and uncover secrets.

From the forlorn ruins, a mysterious call echoes... Within the desolate relics, ghostly whispers resound. What hidden truth lies behind the legend? Only the full moon knows, her haunting melody carrying the weight of her sighs...

name: Exedra Chao: Combat
description: A 2D Chao fighting game featuring the Chao of the Xicon Exedra universe. The game is a 1-on-1 fighting game with Arcade Mode, VS Mode, and Team Battle Mode. The characters indeed are Chao that can be seen in the Sonic series, but these Chao specifically are in the Exedra Chao world located in the Xicon Exedra universe - even if many look exactly like the ones from Sonic. This game is free-to-play and is practically a fan game of the Chao from Sonic, but are the OC Chao of XiconExertoroyah.

name: Bumer: Sorvannye bashni
description:
Bumer: Sorvannye bashni is an arcade first-person shooter with racing elements. It is based on the Russian movie Bumer, but as a free interpretation. The gameplay consists of racing, gang chases and gunfights. Racing levels are similar to sprint races from the Need for Speed series. The player races point-to-point tracks and needs to finish before an opponent.

Chases in Bumer consist of racing and shooting elements. AI-controlled passengers of the character's car kill enemies to defend the car. For every killed enemy the player receives new weapons. These include assault rifles - AK-47 and AKSU, Makarov and Tokarev pistols, double-barreled and sawed-off shotguns, grenades. Temporary bonuses are also provided, such as invisibility, health regeneration, faster speed, slow motion, full ammunition, radioactivity and others.

The gameplay of the last two levels is pure first-person shooting: you kill enemies, take the bonuses and weapons for every killed enemy and complete objectives such as placing the bomb, killing a boss, and defending against enemies.

An additional game mode called 'Sorvannye bashni' is a survival level where you need to defend against waves of enemies.

name: Luck & Loot
description: Luck & Loot is a dice-building roguelike set in a 1-bit dark fantasy world. Craft and customize powerful dice, collect game-changing relics, and battle corrupted foes across procedurally generated dungeons.

name: PedalVerse
description: PedalVerse combines the thrill of downhill MTB racing with the freedom of FPV drone exploration. Customize your rider and bike, race dynamic tracks, and set records to climb the leaderboard. Tackle challenges and explore a semi-open world. Ready to take on the challenge?

name: Youkoso Jitsuryoku Shijoushugi no Kyoushitu he: Merge Puzzle Tokubetsu Shiken
description:
Experience the story of the "Yomi" anime with the easy-to-use and addictive "Merge Puzzle"!
There are no difficult operations to advance the game! Combine various objects and clear the mission!
The side scenario also features a behind-the-scenes story that is not depicted in the anime!

Embark on a 30-day expedition through a 30-floor dungeon, where each level presents randomized events and challenges, and strengthen Matilda by exploring and engaging in friendly interactions. Balance dungeon exploration with deepening her bonds to maximize your team's effectiveness.

name: The Legend of the Lost Temple
description: The Legend of the Lost Temple is a platformer that takes place in the rain forest of Peru where an ancient tribe has lived in peace for thousands of year until a group of archaeologists stumbles upon it. The visitors carry a virus that the natives have no immunity to and soon everyone but the young and strong members of the community falls ill. The player takes control of one such young man, Kanu, who sets out to find a temple located deep within a mountain. It is believed that entombed in the temple is an elixir that can save the natives. It is the player's task to find this elixir. Like in other platformers the game involves moving left and right and jumping between platforms while combating a large amount of different creatures (bees, eagles, green men etc.) that stand in the player's way. To kill the enemies Kanu has an unlimited supply of axes (similar to Wonder Boy and Adventure Island) that can be thrown. Other weapons can be acquired by picking up green or blue shields. The green shield gives a mace while the blue shield gives a bolt of magic. Other collectibles include gems that give bonus points and various potions that give increased abilities such as higher jumps, temporary invulnerability, increases fire rate, freeze monsters and provide extra lives. When starting out Kanu has four lives and a limited amount of life blood. Life blood is drained when contact with enemies are made and when it is all gone a life is lost.

Inspired by "The Stanley Parable," this mod introduces a metafictional experience where Yuri becomes self-aware of the game's structure and mechanics. Players navigate through various scenarios, making choices that lead to multiple endings, each offering a unique exploration of Yuri's character and her interactions within the literature club. The mod features custom graphics, animations, and a soundtrack tailored to enhance the immersive experience.

name: Railroads Online: Pioneer DLC
description:
Be one of the first to conquer the untamed country with the Pioneer DLC. This pack contains the Bell’s Gap 0-6-0 tender locomotive built by the Bells Gap Railroad of Pennsylvania. This 15 ton 0-6-0 was the first engine to move freight and passengers along their 8.5 mile route between Bell’s Mills and Lloyd. As a 0-6-0, this steam engine is suited to switching duties and light freight service. The Pioneer DLC also contains the unique Red Mountain Depot building, which was originally located in a railroad wye in the town of Red Mountain in Colorado. You can also look forward to a special Lake Valley Skin for the Montezuma engine.

This pack contains:

The Bell’s Gap 0-6-0 tender locomotive

The Red Mountain Depot building

The Lake Valley special skin for the Montezuma engine

Take control and embellish the landscape of the West by placing animals and items of nature however you choose. Blaze new trails across the U.S., driving the expansion of commerce, industry, and railways with the powerful FE&MV 4-8-0 Mastodon locomotive and the newly designed D&RG Class 2 Caboose wagon.

FE&MV 4-8-0 Mastodon locomotive with 3 skins (black/red, green, black)

D&RG Class 2 Caboose wagon with a green and red skin

Placeable wild animals (Cougar, Bear, Young Bear, Bison, Golden Eagle, Bald Eagle, Deer)

Placeable unique environmental and nature items

The game is set in the not-too-distant future, where humans have managed to artificially evolve animals. The pet squad S.L.U. is an organization responsible for maintaining order between humans and the evolved animals, known as Animanos.

As an operator, you will have to support your squad at all times, guide them along the correct path, and protect them from enemies or themselves. To achieve this, you will have access to the most advanced technology, allowing you to teleport objects and even slow down time.
